summary: Adds smithing synergy bonus perks to weapon trees. More defence against your specialized weapon. Reduce stamina drain from power attacks. Fights are more involved.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This mod is being reborn in a better way here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13502]Balanced and Split Sword Axe Mace Weapon Perks[/url]
This page probably won\'t get much attention anymore![/b]
[center]

[color=008000][size=4][b]What this Mod does[/b][/size][/color]
[color=008080][size=3][b] One-Handed[/b][/size][/color]
* Changed 1st perk to \"General One-Handed Training\", 3lvls
 - lvl1 - One-handed weapons do 30% more damage. Take 3% less damage and 10% fewer critical hits from one-handed weapon attacks.
 - lvl2 - Take 9% less damage and 30% less criticals from one-handed weapon attacks.
 - lvl3 - Take 15% less damage and 50% less criticals from one-handed weapon attacks.
* Added Smithing Insight - gain a small tempering bonus only for One Handed weapons
* Added a level to Fighting Stance - 50% less stamina reduction from power attacks

[color=008080][size=3][b] Two-Handed[/b][/size][/color]
* Changed 1st perk to \"General One-Handed Training\", 3lvls
 - lvl1 - Two-handed weapons do 30% more damage. Take 3% less damage and 10% fewer critical hits from one-handed weapon attacks.
 - lvl2 - Take 9% less damage and 30% less criticals from two-handed weapon attacks.
 - lvl3 - Take 15% less damage and 50% less criticals from two-handed weapon attacks.
* Added Smithing Insight - gain a small tempering bonus only for Two Handed weapons
* Added a level to Champion\'s Stance - 50% less stamina reduction from power attacks

[i] - NOTE:  Critical reduction example: enemy critical chance is 10%, 50% less becomes 5%)[/i]

[color=008080][size=3][b] Archery[/b][/size][/color]
* Moved to: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]Improved Archery and Bows[/url] !!!

[color=008000][size=4][b]The Goal of this Mod[/b][/size][/color]
 - balance and diversifies the use of weapon perks in the game.
 - make max weapon damage higher earlier lower later
 - make fights more involved.
 - tempt players to cross-discipline a little more. 
 - make mages more deadly in comparison

[color=008000][size=4][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]
- this mod alters the one/two-handed skill trees, other mods that also do so are likely to not be compatible.
- this mod can be added mid-game, all perks transfer over seamlessly 

[color=008000][size=5][b]Mod Recommendations[/b][/size][/color]
Using this mod with my other Balance mods gives a fully, truly balanced game.
* [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10634]Balanced Armor Effects - Heavy and Light Perks[/url] *
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10521]Balanced Crafting Project - Enchanting Smithing Alchemy[/url] *
I strongly recommend using these three together.
[/center]
author: Athyra

files.name: Balanced Weapon Skill Perks v2
files.changelogHtml: Adds critical avoidance to the \"Know your Enemy\" perks in addition to damage reduction.

files.name: Balanced Weapon Skill Perks v3
files.changelogHtml:
reduced 1st perk to 3 lvls
Added \"Smithing Insight\" perks to gain a smithing bonus for trained armor types
Reduce stamina for power attacks
Added a flat +30% damage to first perk in trees

files.name: Balanced Weapon Skill Perks v4
files.changelogHtml: Removed CK bugs to increase compatibility with other mods.

files.name: Balanced Weapon Skill Perks v5
files.changelogHtml: Modified \"Smithing Insight\" so it always gives a bonus regardless of current smithing level. This is to bypass the awkward Skyrim smithing \"jumps\" in improvement

files.name: Balanced Weapon Skill Perks v6
files.changelogHtml: Moved Archery tree to this mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037

files.name: Balanced Weapon Skill Perks v6a
files.changelogHtml:
renamed the perks so they could be found easily through console commands
minor description changes for aesthetics
